description:
On a recent afternoon, Cody met up with his sister and her new husband, Nikko Alexander. When his sister said that she had to leave for a meeting and that she was leaving her hubby behind, Cody didn't think anything of it. He offered the guy a place to hang out, and even let him take a shower.

Cody, being the sexual deviant that he is, thought it would be fun & exciting to pull out his fat cock and giving it a good stroking while Nikko was washing off. What he didn't expect was for Nikko to sneak up on him while he was in the act. Not only does Nikko sneak a peak of his new friend jerking off, but he takes control and gets on his knees and takes Cody's hardon into his mouth, sucking the hunk dry.

Enjoy!
title: The House Guest
